solution_line_template: Combining Monday and Tuesday, they raked {monday_bags} + {tuesday_bags} = <<{monday_bags}+{tuesday_bags}={total_bags_mon_tue}>>{total_bags_mon_tue} bags of leaves.
They earned {total_bags_mon_tue} * ${charge_per_bag} = ${total_bags_mon_tue}*{charge_per_bag}={earnings_mon_tue}>>{earnings_mon_tue} for the first two days.
O for Wednesday's work they earned ${total_earnings_three_days} - ${earnings_mon_tue} = ${total_earnings_three_days}-{earnings_mon_tue}={earnings_wednesday}>>{earnings_wednesday}.
Thus, they raked ${earnings_wednesday} / ${charge_per_bag} = <<{earnings_wednesday}/{charge_per_bag}={bags_wednesday}>>{bags_wednesday} bags of leaves on Wednesday.
